Reviews.Title: “Great Business Trip”
Reviews.Author: Jini C
Reviews.Content: Jessica and Sam are THE greatest and were so helpful - Jessica even took us to the Convention Center one morning when our cab no showed! :) The rooms are comfortable and clean and are a great value!

Reviews.Title: “Nice and refurbished room”
Reviews.Author: Susanne W
Reviews.Content: Friendly and helpful front desk quiet room large bed HBO inroom

Reviews.Title: “Good value and service”
Reviews.Author: ColoradoJess123
Reviews.Content: Our rooms were remodeled nicely, not fancy. Breakfast was just juice, coffee, packaged muffins and fruit, not bad but not great. Very convenient to the convention center, which was the reason for my trip. The area wasn't great, but I didn't feel unsafe either. The service from Sam, the manager, was outstanding. If you need value, this is the way to go!

Reviews.Title: “Arizona Vacation”
Reviews.Author: AnchorageaJackie
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Phoenix for a vacation and had set up arrangements to stay here a head of time. What a great place and value. The room was comfortable and clean. Staff were helpful and friendly. We then made arrangements at the end of our vacation to stay here again for two nights because of all of the above. We will recomment this place to our friends who trave to Phoenix in the future. We hope to return as well. Jackie A. Anchorage, Alaska

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Diptangshu
Reviews.Content: Hi Stayed at this property for a week. It is in Down town area and very near to the Light rail and Bus stop. A good option to select.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: GMoniNYC
Reviews.Content: I stayed in room #109 on the ground floor. The room was clean and the bed linen was fresh. The mini-fridge, and microwave worked. Sam at the front desk was very friendly and informative - Thanks. The free wireless high-speed internet access worked with NO problems and the LCD TV with lots of channels was nice. The free parking ourside my room door was appreciated. Also, the breakfast of fresh fruit, coffee, juice and pastries was basic, it was good enough to get my morning started. While the neighbourhood is not that nice in terms of amenities for visitors, I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Little gem in downtown.”
Reviews.Author: LindaFt.Worth
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night after coming in late from PHX airport. We flew standby and never know if we will make the flight or not. The front desk was great in working with us holding our room to the last minute. We made the flight and the front desk again set up last minute free shuttle service from the airport and hotel. The hotel is an older facility that has been recently update. Our room was great with a plush, soft king size bed, microwave and small refrigerator. Room was clean with adequate towels, etc. The only negative is the continental breakfast. It's bare minimum with coffee/juice, packaged muffins and apples/bananas. It also does not have any seating area. However, don't let that stop you...a McDonalds is just down the street. For the price, you can't beat this little gem in downtown Phoenix.

Reviews.Title: “Americas Best Value Inn - Downtown Phoenix”
Reviews.Author: TMFarnham
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night. Accomodation was much better than expected. Service was good, and the room was well appointed and clean. The price included transport from and back to Phoenix International airport. Breakfast was basic but acceptable. The staff were friendly and helpful. Not in the best part of town, but only 5 minutes walk from the centre. It's on Van Buren, which can be noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased”
Reviews.Author: TRGSD
Reviews.Content: Went to Phoenix to attend NCAA Basketball Tournament at US Air Arena in downtown Phoenix. Didn't need fancy accommodations; just a no frills hotel or motel to sleep at, that was priced right, was clean, well run, and that was walking distance from the Arena. This motel was ideal for my needs and price range. Room was more than adequate for my needs, location was great, and price (with tax) was $80/night. Hotel manager was a nice guy.

Reviews.Title: “Two Night Stay- Very Pleasant”
Reviews.Author: Robert F
Reviews.Content: Very clean, comfortable room and the couple who managed the Inn were very friendly and went out of their way to be helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for money”
Reviews.Author: 60971Jesper
Reviews.Content: I needed to stay a night in Phoenix. This hotel offered a good price for a beautiful room and they also offered an airport shuttle which was very important to me. Even though I missed my initial pick up because of a long line at customs. They made no problems at the shuttle.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic value and great service!”
Reviews.Author: JNRG
Reviews.Content: As a previous reviewer noted, this truly is a "diamond in the rough"! It's located in an area that appears a bit run-down but conversely, is also only a few blocks walk to downtown Phoenix with plentiful shops, restaurants, and bars. We felt very safe walking during daylight/dusk to downtown establishments and to do some sight seeing by foot. The general location of the hotel allowed easy access to I-10, downtown, and is not too far from spring training ballparks. I personally wouldn't go walking down VanBuren away from the downtown area too late at night but that said, I did not feel unsafe at all during our stay. The room itself was great. Clean, modern decor, refrigerator, microwave, large flat-screen television, and free high speed wi-fi. Check in and out was a breeze. Sam was so accommodating and helpful! Free airport shuttle was a major selling point for us when booking this hotel. The shuttle both ways went without a hitch, and we really appreciated this service of the hotel. Please note you need to arrange this shuttle ahead of time so keep this in mind when booking. They do offer coffee and packaged pastry items, as well as some fruit, for breakfast in the check-in building. Overall, it offered a clean, quiet stay with great service, and was extremely affordable. It's like a little-known secret in Phoenix that part of me is hesitant to share (so I can ensure availability for myself) but the other part of me wants to tell everyone about! :) Would I return during my next trip to Phoenix? Without a doubt!

Reviews.Title: “Lives Up to Name”
Reviews.Author: vatonorteno
Reviews.Content: The brand name of the property is quite accurate. It is assuredly the best value for the money for a standard motel in Phoenix and I priced around its competitors quite a bit. Its location downtown is a good starting place for trips all over the Phoenix area. The surrounding area is somewhat derelict, however, we didn't have any problems while we were there. It was surprisingly quiet in the evening. We appreciated the microwave and little refrigerator found in each room. The parking area, it should be noted, is very tight. The double-lock on the door was very difficult to set. I had made reservations for two rooms on the first floor, however, the Patels said that my request was not in the computer and they could not accommodate my request. That would be corporate's fault, apparently. The TV remote control worked only occasionally. Despite these issues, I would still recommend the place. The concerns are things that can be easily remedied.

Reviews.Title: “Best service of any hotel I've stayed at. Ever.”
Reviews.Author: larspind
Reviews.Content: The place is clean and nicely furnished and done. Better than most places we have stayed at. But what really makes the place shine is Jessica and Sam, the managers of the place. They're genuinely friendly and helpful. It even feels like they genuinely like their jobs and their customers which is unusual and makes all the difference in the world.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Great Service”
Reviews.Author: RelaxedYo
Reviews.Content: Don't judge this hotel by the surrounding area. This hotel is a very nice surprise when you look at the value. I chose this hotel over many others in the are because of the reviews. The rooms were excellent and the staff was excellent. The hotel is very close to I-10 which was very nice since I was there to see spring training baseball. The only negative at this hotel is the noise level from the road, but that was easily solved by turning on the AC. I would definitely stay at this hotel and recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Worried at first, but loved the place.”
Reviews.Author: Kevin B
Reviews.Content: When driving to the hotel, I was a tiny bit worried. It's a couple blocks west of the tall buildings in Phoenix, in an area that's a little rundown. Not dangerous at all, just "older" The staff was really nice, and helpful. The rooms were really nice, and the beds were really comfortable. Only negatives: parking spots are tight and no pool. Everything else was great, don't be scared driving up to the place, it really is a great place to stay in Phoenix.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Margo532
Reviews.Content: The hotel has everything a traveller might need for a very reasonable price. Was very satisfied with my stay. Breakfast has the minimum assortment. The bigger problem - cleanliness of a carpet. don't take your shoes off.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Location”
Reviews.Author: GothikTraveler
Reviews.Content: The room was spacious and comfortable and much less expensive than downtown hotels a few blocks away. The rate includes breakfast, free wifi, and free shuttle ride to the airport (requires a reservation). It is about a 10-minute walk away from the Convention Center and nearby sites such as the science museum and heritage park.

Reviews.Title: “A Diamond in the rough”
Reviews.Author: William L
Reviews.Content: I have to admit that I was a bit worried about what I would find when I arrived in Phoenix and the America's Best Value Inn, but I was genuinely surprised. The room was very comfortable, and I was happily surprised to find a mini-fridge and microwave in the room. The bathroom/shower area was in decent shape, with the tub showing the most wear throughout the entire room, but still in decent shape. The lighting was good. Wireless internet was free, fast, and easy to connect to. The staff was also very helpful getting me in to my room as I arrived very early (before noon), and were helpful in helping me navigate the downtown area and supplying suggestions for food options. I will definitely stay with ABVI the next time I have to stay near downtown PHX for business!

Reviews.Title: “Phoenix, risen from the Ashes”
Reviews.Author: anng99
Reviews.Content: Recently refurbished and the better for it. Clean rooms, helpful reception. NEED to BOOK AIRPORT SHUTTLE in advance if required Breakfast could be better.

Reviews.Title: “Good place for the rate”
Reviews.Author: somenob
Reviews.Content: This was a clean, comfortable place to rest our heads after each of 3 days of walking the surroundings areas. The room had a great bed and pillows that were so comfortable and there is a hair dryer. Breakfast is coffee and juice with packaged danish, but for the price, who can complain? The people at the desk were very friendly. Close to downtown, but otherwise not much around the hotel (except Wells Fargo museum), but we went to do the touristy thing anyway, so knew we would be driving. Free parking and free wi-fi that worked well.

Reviews.Title: “Great Price ! Great Location ! Great Hotel Staff !”
Reviews.Author: TreyAtay
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel which is nearby Downtown Phoenix. It is only walking distance and the hotel is very clean ! At the same time, the hotel personal is very friendly and very helpful. I strongly suggest everyone to stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “What a find!”
Reviews.Author: Myrna P
Reviews.Content: My brother and I escaped to Phoenix for some sun, hockey and basketball. This motel filled all our needs. It is so close to the downtown core, one doesn't need a vehicle to get out to restaurants. It is close to freeways for getting away to explore other areas of the state. it is a short walk to see a Suns game. The airport is very easily acessible. The inn is clean, comfortable, very affordable, safe, quiet and the staff are very helpful and friendly. This is a real find. Not fancy, not pretentious, just a great place to stay while visiting in the Phoenix area.

Reviews.Title: “very satisfaction”
Reviews.Author: Shuai L
Reviews.Content: really convient to downtown. and so clean in room. the price is very good. Parking free in yard.

Reviews.Title: “Very inexpensive for what you get, close to everything.”
Reviews.Author: amy2956
Reviews.Content: Fantastic stay, housekeeping staff excellent, value for money excellent. Close to downtown phoenix, clean room, flat screen tv.

Reviews.Title: “You can get a great value of money if you stay here”
Reviews.Author: KDkim
Reviews.Content: This hotel was close to the downtown, people were very frienly. I saw many Koreans here, who want use hotel economically.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean, and welcoming.”
Reviews.Author: RMom_12
Reviews.Content: When I arrived at the hotel, my son and my husband had been there several days already. My son told me that the on site manager was extremely helpful and very nice. We had faxes coming in and needed some of our paperwork before check-out and the manager was willing to provide everything we needed. We understood they had recently redecorated the rooms, and we felt very fortunate to find this hotel which was exactly where we needed to be. We are heading back to the same area and plan on staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean, Good Value!”
Reviews.Author: Ruben E
Reviews.Content: I was visiting Phoenix for a conference at the Phoenix Convention Center, this hotel is within walking distance (8 minutes) and a lot cheaper than the hotels next to the center. Parking is free and the people at the desk are very friendly and helpful. Internet access and the breakfast (that includes juice and fruit), are a plus.

Reviews.Title: “America's Best Value Really Is!”
Reviews.Author: Renee N
Reviews.Content: America's Best Value Inns truly are the best value available if you want a refrigerator, microwave, no pets/no smoking and super clean rooms, complimentary breakfast with fresh fruit, free HBO, onsite laundry, convenient parking, and the most comfortable beds imaginable in a budget hotel. In my recent stay at the downtown Phoenix ABVI, the managers and housekeeping were exceptionally friendly, very helpful and immediately responsive with a malfunctioning lock. I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to the Phoenix area because I received better service here than in overpriced luxury hotels in the past.

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price but bring EARPLUGS!!!”
Reviews.Author: dvmkathymurf
Reviews.Content: I would rate this place better except for the noise factor. The first night was the worst as they feel the need to empty the dumpsters behind our room at 5:00 am and it sounds as if it is right next to your bed. The rooms were recently renovated and are very nice on the inside, with new paint, carpeting and nice flat-screen tvs. They probably should have spent some money on soundproofing as the traffic noise is very bad. I would advise they purchase earplugs in bulk (like some rock concerts do) and dispense them at check-in. Just bring your earplugs and you will rate this place excellent!!!

Reviews.Title: “ray d”
Reviews.Author: ray d
Reviews.Content: down town hotel, clean, well maintained, nicely renovated. had fridge & micro wave, no coffee maker. Counter people polite & helpful. Breakfast so-so. would stay there again.would recommend if you want a economical room with no great frills, ( pool,spa etc.)

Reviews.Title: “Clean, very helpful and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Victor O
Reviews.Content: Yes, from the phone call to book the room to checking out at the end, it was a very pleasant experience. I misplaced a vital piece of luggage at the airport and Jessica helped greatly to reclaim it without drama. Room was very nice and clean and spacious. Shuttle from the airport was timely. Breakfast will fill a gap but don't expect anything fancy - but fits the room price. well recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the price”
Reviews.Author: Stacey M
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and modern. Bed was comfortable! The only problem we had was that there is limited parking. 2 nights we had to find street parking (which was close by) because the small lot was full. Another night we had to find street parking because other guests took up more than one spot. A coffee maker in the room would have been a plus!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome for price”
Reviews.Author: RuthieSeattle
Reviews.Content: In an ok part of town, very close to a very bad part of town (just across freeway - we went the wrong way first). Very normal people staying here and nice family running it. Only stayed one night, cancelled our next two nights. Small rooms, no pool, standard motel but very nicely renovated. Loud - busy street that did get quiet after midnight, but we had a pipe or something in the wall that banged all night. Breakfast wasn't worth going downstairs for. We had our almost three year old along, went to a resort with pools and more room.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: bennett d
Reviews.Content: Jessika and Sam, i believe they are husband and wife were very hospitable, my daughter forgot to clip her nails, it was like home, Sam let us borrow his nail clipper. Jessika drove us to the airport with her personal car when the complimentary van fell through. The bed were very comfortable. The hotel itself was not that far from the phoenix convention center and other recreation center. If you want to take the train, it is only 3-4 blocks away.Hope to see you next year with our next gymnastics competition. Bennett and Corzette

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and convenient”
Reviews.Author: seeker1866
Reviews.Content: We were attending functions at the state capitol and this was a great location for us. The beds were comfortable; new flat screen TV's and plenty of hot water for baths. We had no problem with neighbor noise. The room isn't equipped with a coffee pot (we had brought our own travel pot thankfully) but after 6:30 am there is coffee, orange juice, sweet rolls and fresh fruit in the office. I would definitely stay here in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Better than it looks”
Reviews.Author: Thomas S
Reviews.Content: The rooms of this hotel have been recently remodeled and are very nice with comfortable beds. You may initially be a little put off by the exterior appearance. While the exterior is well kept it is in need of a face lift. This is offset by the very reasonable room rates which are surprising given that the Inn is in downtown Phoenix and very close to the Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport. The Inn does not have the continental breakfast that some other hotels do. The manager said that they do not have the space for a breakfast room. So, instead they offer free coffee, orange juice, fresh fruit, and a pastry assortment to take back to your room. My wife and I were very well satisfied with the Inn and have booked a room for our return to Phoenix after visiting the Grand Canyon and other Arizona sights.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Pat E
Reviews.Content: Clean and comfortable and quite a bargain for a downtown metropolitan hotel. We loved being within walking distance of theatres, sports venues, great restaurants, and public transportation. Very easy drive to and from airport. We rented a car--and appreciated the free parking--but with free airport shuttle one could get by with public transportation. Free coffee, juice, fresh fruit, and packaged sweet rolls probably won't satisfy big breakfast eaters, but we went to Matt's Big Breakfast, a three minute drive away, most mornings anyway. Those who can't stand traffic noise may want to invest in ear plugs since it's on a busy corner, but we always come prepared because even the best insulated, posh establishments are not safe from loud patrons. Staff was exceptionally friendly and accommodating. We too were upgraded.

Reviews.Title: “Nice on the inside”
Reviews.Author: Berry E
Reviews.Content: The place looks run down on the outside but the rooms are surprisingly nice. The wi-fi works great. They could greatly reduce noise from the road if they would fix the weatherstripping and adjust the latch to close tightly. There was a gap all around the door that allowed noise in. With the fan running all the time the road noise wasn't too bad. Overall a good value. The king size bed was very comfortable and we liked the pillows because they were foam pillows that were thick enough for sleeping on your side.

Reviews.Title: “Very good, except the traffic noise in night”
Reviews.Author: Wei H
Reviews.Content: Advantages: The room is clean, and the staff is very kind. Free shuttle service is good, and the distance to Sky harbor airport is near. Disadvantages: Breakfast need improving. The traffice noise in night is horrible.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly staff, nice clean comfortable rooms, and great location”
Reviews.Author: Daniela D
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this motel! Very accommodating and friendly staff. Rooms were clean and very comfortable. Couldn't ask for a better bargain - and at a great location in downtown Phoenix.

Reviews.Title: “Nice accommodations, Clean, Warm and accommodating staff.”
Reviews.Author: David K
Reviews.Content: Great price, extremely nice staff made my trip to Phoenix for a job interview less stressful. I had to stay an extra night on a very busy weekend in Phoenix and they went out of their way to help me out. Got the job and now will be coming to Phoenix on sales calls. I will absolutely stay with them again.

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: Mamta K
Reviews.Content: Great service. We had issues with our flight and ended up here. Great service, helped us with our bags and called the complementary shuttle for us

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly nice, newly renovated motel in downtown Phoenix”
Reviews.Author: wrenchard
Reviews.Content: This motel's convenient location in downtown Phoenix and its low rates made it a no-brainer for a weekend stay for our youth cycling team. We were staying in Phoenix for a 3-day bicycle race. The staff was extremely accommodating, especially given the fact that we had about a dozen people with bikes that needed to be stored in the rooms. The motel had been newly remodeled, and it showed. The interior decoration of the rooms was surprisingly elegant, the beds comfortable, and the standard amenities were all in place. I'd definitely stay here again, and highly recommend this motel to anyone traveling through Phoenix.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: aes1978
Reviews.Content: I am in Phoenix several times a year for personal business, and this is a great value compared to other places I've previously stayed. The rooms are large and nicely remodeled. This includes a large, flatscreen TV, a fridge/freezer, and free wireless internet. The staff is great! They are very friendly, always willing to help, and very accommodating. It's close to everything downtown/central Phoenix. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel is wonderful.”
Reviews.Author: Fernando I
Reviews.Content: Even after i spilt my drink on the sheets and i was forced to ask the attendance to change them we still recieved excellent service. The prices are the best in town especially for the convienent location that it is in, within walking distance of the U.S. Airways center just in case you decide to catch a game(which is well worth the money).Overall experience was outstanding, I would defenitly recommend to friends. Also the hotel has excellent and CLEAN rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Down Town Phoenix”
Reviews.Author: Dayton F
Reviews.Content: On short notice a friend and I were attending a Suns game and started fishing through the internet only to find the America's Best Value Inn. At first we were only looking for 2 rooms with a reasonable rate and a place to park a vehicle. The place was situated within walking distance of US Airways Center and was priced right. Upon arrival we were blown away. The clean and spacious rooms, flat screen t.v.'s, free internet and parking were just a small part compared to the warm, friendly receptionist and host for our stay. I will definitely stay at this America's Best Value Inn again when I'm in town.

Reviews.Title: “very nice people work there”
Reviews.Author: atashenka
Reviews.Content: I like the hotel. I stayed there for 2 days. The room was clean and pretty big with new furniture. The guys who work there are super nice and friendly and always are ready to help.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: LWeirHalifax_Canada
Reviews.Content: We choose to stay at this hotel bc we were flying in early before a business conference to do a Grand Canyon Tour and wanted to see a bit of downtown. The free shuttle service was on time and the driver was very friendly and even gave us tips on what to see (and not). The hotel is only 15 min from the airport and located downtown just a short 10 min walk from everything. Although one should know in advance the only thing downtown is Chase Field and a few mall steips aside from that all the fun stuff (shopping, food, entertainment etc) is in Scottsdale a good 45 min on city train $3.50 all day pass.The hotel staff were very friendly and saw to all our needs. The hotel was recently renovated; meaning fresh paint, carpets, linen etc...Very moden and Very clean. I was impressed for the price we paid (I was a bit worried I admit but it all turned out great).Great Location to see what DT looks like a De Souza tours picked us up for the GC Tour. We saved lots by staying in Americas Best Value Inn. However, if your in town for more than 2 days (unlike us) you would be better off staying in Scottsdale where the tourist attractions are. I do recommend going on the city train....its a neat way to see the diff't neighbourhoods of Phoenix for a cheap price.

Reviews.Title: ““Friendly staff and convenient location!””
Reviews.Author: Herry007
Reviews.Content: Location is superb right off I-10. The hotel is clean, great value, and very friendly staff. The free breakfast is awesome. I will definitely go back anytime I need a place to stay in Phoenix. I highly recommend this to anyone. This place will not disappoint you. thank you sam and jessica for your superb hospitality..

Reviews.Title: “Short Stay In Phoenix”
Reviews.Author: paul m
Reviews.Content: First time in Phoenix for 3 nights on a DIY vacation of the states travelling from Scotland. Very happy with the room - clean, well serviced and everything we needed. Microwave,fridge,safe and very good internet access. Basic laundry service was adequate. Breakfast very basic, but for the room rate we paid we had no complaints whatsoever. It was a 5 minute walk to the downtown area and there was no problem with noise either from traffic or from the rest of the complex. Check in and check out was simple. When we left our cab didn't show so Jessica at reception took us to the airport in her own car - that was very good of her. She was very helpful any time we asked for anything at reception. So a big thank you to Jessica !! Simple,clean,well run with friendly staff,central and within a good budget - this is definatley well reccomended.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: Rann95
Reviews.Content: Great service! We realized our room battery was dead before we left for dinner and they had it fixed by the time we got back. Pretty clean. The location is what really made it a nice stay! Very close to restaurants and some bars.

Reviews.Title: “Very very adequate indeed”
Reviews.Author: Gilly H
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a whole week (!) as we were working at the convention center down the road. The people who run it are very helpful. The rooms are nicely decorated and mine had a microwave and fridge. Breakfast is fine is you just want coffee, fruit and sugary cakes, but there are plenty of places nearby to get a proper breakfast if desired. Clean and comfortable beds, hot showers and reasonably priced. Plus free shuttle to and from the airport. No butler, - or tea. But you get what you pay for :-)

Reviews.Title: “My stay over the last weekend”
Reviews.Author: elahe053
Reviews.Content: I just was not too sure what I would get with my AARP discounted rate at this motel. The neighborhood was kind of iffy but I still went for it. After a long in a shuttle, light rail, running around air ports, I checked in and saw a clean, beautiful room, with refrigerator, microwave, and hot water and everything working. I really enjoyed my walk to the convention center, downtown phonix. I would stay at this motel over and over again.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Surprise”
Reviews.Author: skykiva
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff, clean comfortable rooms. Centrally located. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “America's Best Value Inn - Downtown Phoenix”
Reviews.Author: Keith B
Reviews.Content: Because of a flight delay that had us arrive in Phoenix at 10:30 p.m, we found ourselves needing a budget-friendly place for a one-night stay in Phoenix on our way to Sedona. This motel met our needs regarding location, had free airport shuttle available (which was very prompt in pick-up) and was within walking distance to Hyatt Hotel where we rented a car (Enterprise--much less expensive there than at the airport!) The staff was very accommodating, friendly and helpful. The facility and room were clean, well-maintained, and recently redecorated. Furniture was "new" and included mini-fridge, microwave and ironing board. A simple complimentary continental breakfast was also available. A good find!

Reviews.Title: “Pros & Cons of this Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Geri B
Reviews.Content: Bed was very firm. I liked that it had a Fridge & microwave in the room. Bathroom could of used some bleach in the tub & the TV is in need of updating.

Reviews.Title: “Great little place!”
Reviews.Author: Dana K
Reviews.Content: If you don't want to spend a lot of $$, but want a great room...this is it! Very clean and modern, nice comfy beds and great amenities. Great proximity to downtown too. Ran in the Arizona Rock n'Roll marathon and was literally 2 blocks from the start line! Close to the convention center, then metro & downtown eateries (Go to Hanny's and get either the The BLT Supremo or the Roast Beef Sandwich..both AMAZING! Oh..and the $5 snack plate...SO good!). Front desk staff was very friendly. Hot coffee & pastries in the am as promised. Very pleased with our stay here! We'll be back next year!

Reviews.Title: “STAY HERE! Trust me.”
Reviews.Author: Marque H
Reviews.Content: The rooms were really cute and obviously newly remodeled, very clean and well worth the reasonable cost!!!!! The beds were really comfy and very clean. The desk staff was very friendly and helpful .We stayed for an event at Chase field, and it was within walking distance. I will stay there again, without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: “Must come! Must see! Must STAY!!!”
Reviews.Author: tasha m
Reviews.Content: first and foremost the staff here are wonderful people .... great heart ! great spirit. most importantly they make you feel comfortable and welcomed. the room to my am!azement was comfortable and very elegant. very clean, no bugs , organized , and very very nice. they offer free local phone calls, there is no where is phoenix that would offer free phone calls. my service was prompt and always seemed to show consideration and concern just to make sure my state was made out to be happy and comfortable. They are always trying to get you the best deal possible. I like the fact that they're not trying to take my money but help me get the best for my buck! now that is quality care thank you americas best value inn you're the greatest. shot out go out to jessica and her husband thank you to both view

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: reyronces
Reviews.Content: This hotel is the best one i stayed at with a good service and price.

Reviews.Title: “great value”
Reviews.Author: FC_EDM
Reviews.Content: good location, great value for downtown phoenix. The owners are friendly and accomodating. the rooms were very clean and very recently renovated. the beds were very comfortable. Only here for a one night stopover. advertised complimentary transport to hotel. assumed could call the courtesy shuttle from airport hotel directory but they are not listed. called the hotel and they said a 24hr advance booking for courtesy transportation was required so we had to take a cab ($22o/w). however they did accomodate the rtn transportation for the next morning on short notice. would definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money.”
Reviews.Author: NickW4
Reviews.Content: Close to city centre. Clean, friendly, best value for money hotel I have stayed in. Will certainly return. Nicholas woodburn.

Reviews.Title: “Kind and Caring Staff”
Reviews.Author: Sammi M
Reviews.Content: Although I myself have not had the opportunity to stay at America's Best Value Inn, I have had the pleasure of working with Jessica and her husband to arrange an extended stay for an international student. These people are wonderful! The young man was by himself over the Christmas holidays and I know that he was treated with kindness by the caring staff. From making reservations to pestering them about the well-being of the student, Jessica and her husband could not have been more gracious. I would highly recommend this hotel from the comments of the young man. I will most certainly take advantage of these accommodations if I ever get the chance!

Reviews.Title: “Stay at America's Best Value Inn-Downtown Phoenix”
Reviews.Author: Balasubramanian M
Reviews.Content: We had spent two nights at the hotel. Rooms were well maintained. Hotel location good. Service at the desk excellent. Will strongly recommend the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Rooms for a Great Rate!”
Reviews.Author: jblynn1979
Reviews.Content: We rented three rooms to make a short film in association with the Phoenix Art Museum. I'm sure we were a big inconvenience, but still, the staff couldn't have been more gracious. While searching for a filming location, we looked at 8 other motels in the same area. The others were fleabags, but this motel was fresh and clean... in fact we had to dirty it up to make it look cheap for our scene. Congrats to the motel for adding a little class to Phoenix!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, very nice staff”
Reviews.Author: Lidia B
Reviews.Content: This motel is great located in downtown Phoenix. The rooms are big, nice and quite modern. Very nice stay!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Jbustillos04
Reviews.Content: Great I loved it very clean and friendly staff. Very easy to find and to get a room late at night. Quite place to rest eventhough it's right on a main street, you won't even notice the traffic passing by.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Katrina J
Reviews.Content: Sam and his wife were very helpful and friendly; the room was large and comfortable, clean and modern. Within walking distance to central Phoenix, with free wifi, parking and breakfast. The airport shuttle was a nice bonus. Would definitely stay here again, great value for money!

Reviews.Title: “Great value the title speaks for itself”
Reviews.Author: yoliwright
Reviews.Content: I loved it would stay here again. very comfortable beds.

Reviews.Title: “Worth the long trip”
Reviews.Author: Vit P
Reviews.Content: Service - 5-star quality!! Sam - a shift manager - made a lot of compelling complementary offers that smooth my stay. Facility - very new and worth every dollar! Distance from the airport - 5 - 10 minutes Cost of shuttle - Free!!! I saved $20 since the hotel managed this for me. Environment - Safe and sound Overall, this is a recommended hotel if you happen to be in Phoenix downtown. I have traveled over the world in the last decade. This place is one of the most impressive I have been.

Reviews.Title: “Won't Stay Any Where Else”
Reviews.Author: savannahwilson09
Reviews.Content: This is my husband and mine's second trip to Phoenix and fourth to Arizona. I have done a lot of research using trip advisor and other sites to try and find a good, clean hotel for us to stay at when we have to come to Arizona throughout the year. We have finally found the perfect hotel and I have to say It Is THE BEST DEAL I have ever found on a hotel! Newly remodeled, our room was very clean from the sheets to the brand new furniture, new microwave, new mini fridge, new tiled bathroom and shower, everything was spotless! The guy at the front desk was really nice, polite, respectable, and helpful. I LOVE THIS PLACE! EVERYTHING IN THE ROOM IS NEW & MOST IMPORTANTLY CLEAN! My husband and I have walked everywhere, there are many great places to eat around and lots of things to do. Museums, Arizona State University, lots of stuff close by. And a nice flat screen t.v!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and inexpensive”
Reviews.Author: Robert F
Reviews.Content: The hotel was in a not so great area of downtown Phoenix but it was clean, newly remodeled and we felt quite safe. The bed was comfortable and the TV was great. For just a place to flop for the night, we will use it again when we are in Phoenix. The total cost was just over $50.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: Nuno_SouthWest
Reviews.Content: Great service, very good location, good modern rooms, excellent value

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Monksflx
Reviews.Content: Good location near the downtown University campus and downtown. Rooms are large, renovated and clean. Managers are friendly and helpful. Cost is very reasonable - we have stayed twice in last month and would definitely stay in same motel on future visits. Rooms are well equipped for traveler (business or pleasure).

Reviews.Title: “Great Choice”
Reviews.Author: patb116
Reviews.Content: The new management, Sam and Jessica are great. The Inn was a great place for our stop in Phoenix, coming from Boston and traveling on to Sedona. Arriving on a late flight from Boston, 11/10/2011, we were picked up via a inn shuttle,and checked into the inn by midnight. The room was clean and met our needs for our overnight stay. Before leaving Friday morning we arranged to check back in the following Friday, early in the afternoon. We choose to stay there while waiting for our flight back home late Friday night, almost midnight. It was a great choice and we were able to walk to downtown Phoenix and then just relax until being shuttled to the airport again for our return flight. Sam and Jessica are doing a great job.......give them a raise. They went out their way to make our stay wonderful.

Reviews.Title: ““Friendly Staff, feel like home””
Reviews.Author: mike007chulavista_CA
Reviews.Content: Great Staff and they are always helpful to us. The nice room, recently renovated with microwave, refrigerator, iron board, free Wi-Fi, breakfast. Phoenix is very nice city and we walk to downtown with no fear. There are lots of restaurants near to motel. The price of room is excellent and cannot beat other hotels near to downtown location. Also, they have great free shuttle service for motel guest which is excellent service for us and I saved $ 40. In my opinion, this is great motel and great customer service for me. Thank you so much Sam and Jessica. I will be there again in February 2012.

Reviews.Title: “Great for business trips”
Reviews.Author: Tedd G
Reviews.Content: This hotel was more than adequate for my recent business trip to Phoenix. I am not terribly picky with my hotel choices; all I ask for is a clean, comfortable, and relatively quiet room with basic amenities. The ABV Inn Phoenix exceeded all of these requirements. The proximity to downtown Phoenix was perfect for this particular job and the free wifi made it easy to do follow-up work from my hotel room.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: Joshua T
Reviews.Content: People at front desk were very friendly. Rates were great. Nice clean rooms. Great location downtown. Would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: Nathan097
Reviews.Content: I stay at America's best value inn Phoenix I enjoy my stay , I feel like home cuz Sam and Jessica give us outstanding customer service at front desk.Moreover , the room is very clean, neat and bed are very comfortable. If I will visit Phoenix again I will stay at this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Good Accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Evelyn B
Reviews.Content: Good room, clean, patient and couteous staff. Pricing reasonable for room rate accommodation. Lady on ground Jessica pleasant. Accommodated use of the office computer to enable travel itinery. Willing to assist whenever necessary. Improve on breakfast - add tea. Avaiable shuttle to the airport. Good team. Keep it up.

Reviews.Title: “great for the value”
Reviews.Author: Andrew c
Reviews.Content: The couple there were very nice. They up graded me to a king size bed. the room was nice and clean with no bugs. Flat screen TV. The breakfast was lacking though. Bananas, apples, juice and a few packaged danishes and coffee. There is a McDonalds two blocks away in plain view of the hotel. I would stay there again if I went back to Pheonix it is about 7-8 blocks from the convention center and their free shuttle is great.........

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: lundfnj1
Reviews.Content: I want to share my satisfaction with this hotel. The price is the most reasonable in the area. It is close within walking distance of all the major downtown phoenix arenas and venues. The staff are very nice and friendly. The rooms are very nice.

Reviews.Title: “nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Donovan R
Reviews.Content: nice clean rooms, helpful staff, pleasure to stay here, inexpensive,and rooms compare to sheridan or other big chains, flat screen tv's and comfortable beds, looks newly remodeled, i've stayed at alot of hotels and this place rises above my expectations. will stay here anytime im in phoenix

Reviews.Title: “GREAT SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: samantha b
Reviews.Content: the service was great, the front clerk was very helpful, polite and kind.

Reviews.Title: “Good cheap value”
Reviews.Author: Roboro
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a budget place to stay this ticks the boxes. very clean room, great staff - both Sam and Jessica are extremely friendly and efficient and all the praise is fully deserved. large beds and TV's, good air con add to the room comfort. Breakfasts are a little disappointing with prepack pastries and cakes being the order of the day - with a little fruit to choose from. Having to take back to your own room to consume is not something I really warmed to.Whilst the area is OK there are one or two strange types walking past as the motel is near a YMCA. That being said if you say no to their request for money they do leave you alone. Don't let this put you off, the management deserve your patronage for their enthusiastic approach and great customer care skills.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Don L
Reviews.Content: Very clean rooms and good check-in check-out service. A great alternative to the very expensive hotels in the area.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Palma de Mallorca, Islas Baleares, Spain
Reviews.Title: “Great service and accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Maria Antonia O
Reviews.Content: Just in Phoenix for one night but the room was comfortable and nice. We had some problems with the GPS and Jessica helped us out. Thanks a lot Jessica. Afterwards, we had a great trip!

Reviews.Title: “Owners went above and beyond!”
Reviews.Author: HeartfeltMemories
Reviews.Content: Owners went above and beyond! I took advantage of shuttle to PHX and more thanks so much for everything! Fabulously clean room and within walking distance to lots!

Reviews.Title: “ongly one words Great and very good sevice Americas Best Value Inn - Downtown Phoenix”
Reviews.Author: Peterallemeesch
Reviews.Content: We have travel a lot into the US, the hospitality and service not 100 % but 1000 % Great place and near international airport of phoenix . Sam again thanks for your help and sorry to wake you up at 5 am . Peter & Ria from Belgium

Reviews.Title: “Good location - very clean”
Reviews.Author: Paul B
Reviews.Content: Just in Phoenix for 1 night and this Inn lived upto its name of Best Value. Very convenient location for downtown. Room was very clean with 2 comfy beds, fridge, microwave, TV with many channels and adequate bathroom. The manager and his wife were extremely helpful and let us keep the room into the late afternoon for a nominal sum to accomadate our flight departure time

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Yo1.Kunishima
Reviews.Content: I have been having a great time at the Americas Best Value Inn Downtown Phoenix. First of all,the hotel is very clean and confortable because I can use WIFI,TV,microwave,fridge. In addtion,the manager of the hotel is kind and good person for me because he tell me how to go somewhere I don't know perfectly. However,I wanted to use bath tab because there is no stopper in the bath tab and I don't use bath tab.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: South Brooklyn, New York, United States
Reviews.Title: “very clean”
Reviews.Author: Marco H
Reviews.Content: hi,i having a great time at the americas best value inn in downtown phoenix . nice location , not too for from downtown ,comfy beds and very clean and quiet nice staff and very helpful ,,there or TV ,microwave ,fridge also there i love it here .

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean - Quiet”
Reviews.Author: Martha V
Reviews.Content: I was in Phoenix for 5 nights. Great Location. The room was very clean and comfortable. Sam and his wife Jessica were very pleasant and accommodating. They faxed some paperwork for me and printed a map for me of the nearest grocery and drug stores. They went the extra mile.

Reviews.Title: “Fab Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Samantha M
Reviews.Content: Hi, had a great time at the americas best value inn in downtown phoenix. Well located, not a long walk walk away from downtown! Comfy beds and very clean - staff are very helpful, if i return to phoenix will be staying there.

Reviews.Title: “It's a great place”
Reviews.Author: Weijing D
Reviews.Content: the room is large and clean. There are TV, microwave oven, fridge, hair drier, flatiron, wi-fi internet and of course air-condition in the room. The inn is so closed to the downtown of phoenix, only 5 to 10 minutes by walking. The staff is very friendly, before we leave, he lent his own weighing machine to us so we can pack our stuff. There is a free shuttle to airport, and it only takes about 15 minutes to get to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “"Recommend to everyone!"”
Reviews.Author: igoramariz
Reviews.Content: First of all, it's very affordable compared to other options in downtown. I paid $50 per day in a king bedroom. It has been remodeled. So it looks like brand new! They offer a comfortable bedroom with ironing, microwave, fridge, cable TV, wi-fi internet and nice bathroom. The staff was really friendly, especially the manager, mr. Sam. He has done everything he could to help us. In my case, I needed to change clothes after the checkout and he allowed me to use a room to do it and also use the bathroom, with no charges! So, the conclusion is that the staff really wanted us to feel like home! I recommend to everyone. Next time I will go to Phoenix, the ABVI Downtown Phoenix will definitely be my choice!

Reviews.Title: “Great inn”
Reviews.Author: Arash R
Reviews.Content: It has very friendly staff. The rooms are very clean and convenient. It has free shuttle to airport. There was a problem to reserve the shuttle to the airport. The manager himself drop me off at airport.

Reviews.Title: “Great Price, Friendly and helpfull staff..would defenatly come back :)”
Reviews.Author: M r
Reviews.Content: Frustration turned to satisfaction! There are many things that i found very satisfactory about our stay! The staff was exceptionally accommodating. The first thing we noticed was the pleasant and efficient front desk staff -including Sam. I Went to Phoenix for a business trip in the middle of the summer. The temperature was triple digits and scorching hot! Check-in was fast and easy and it was relaxing to walk into a cool, air-conditioned room. I got complementary cold water bottle from front desk staff.That is so nice.I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Phoenix!

Reviews.Title: “Great Price, Clean & Comfortable, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: Katherine D
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend staying here if you need to be in downtown Phoenix and can't afford some of the pricier options. I stayed here during my first (and only) trip to Phoenix, and was very pleased with this hotel. It's obviously an economy hotel, but the rooms are very comfortable and clean, and have plenty of space. What's striking about ABVI, though, is that although it's extremely affordable you don't give up anything on the service front -- the service is excellent (the staff here is among the most helpful and friendly I've come across). Also, they offer complementary shuttle to/from the airport if you make a reservation in advance, which will save you a $20 cab ride. The free continental breakfast is coffee, granola bars/pastries, and fresh fruit.

Reviews.Title: “Clean & Comfortable..”
Reviews.Author: goodsoulalways
Reviews.Content: My husband and I, together with 2 friends stayed at this hotel last week. It is a very nice place and service was excellent. The staff is pleasant and always ready to help. The rooms were clean and the bathrooms had good lighting (always a plus for me!). The beds were very comfortable and the linens and towels fresh (that's something I always check). Ice cold A/C felt great after being in 100 degrees outside. :) The property has security cameras, so we felt secure about parking our vehicle outside. A short walk to some great restaurants in downtown was awesome. I would stay at this place again without any hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Great Budget Accommodation”
Reviews.Author: megank2000
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my mom and my brother for All-Star weekend in July 2011. We stayed 3 nights, checking in on Saturday and out on Tuesday. The hotel doesn't look overly impressive from the outside, but the inside and amenities and value completely won us over. This is a great place to stay on a budget if you can't afford the Hyatt right downtown. :-P The rooms really are newly-remodeled and look great inside -- new tile in the bathroom for the floor and shower, granite countertop for the sink area, new furniture in the room, large flat-screen tv, memory foam mattresses for the beds, etc. Our only complaint was that the bathroom door didn't quite shut all the way, but that was room-specific to our room. There's a mini fridge (no freezer in it) and a microwave, too. The a/c was fairly loud, especially while trying to sleep, but being in Phoenix (especially in summer) you're just grateful that it's working. :) Parking is free. Wifi is free (password was included on a card in the room). Continental breakfast was free, and although very basic was still nice to have. There were packaged muffins and pastries and granola bars, a bowl of fruit, and yogurt available in a little fridge in the lobby. They also had coffee, a pitcher of OJ, juice boxes, and bottles of water (definitely awesome). There's a McDonald's 1 block away if you want more easy breakfast options. The best part about this hotel is the value -- it's not the biggest, nicest, fanciest hotel around, but you will pay far less than anything else nearby and within walking distance of downtown. The first night of our stay was $69 and the second two nights were $89 each (jacked up due to the All-Star game, but still cheap comparatively). It's difficult to find anything less than mid-$100's elsewhere nearby. We walked into downtown every day, all the way to Chase Field from the hotel (just over a mile). It was fairly brutal in the July 100+ degree heat, but it's do-able and worth it to not have to pay for (and deal with) parking downtown. There's also a light rail station 4 blocks away from the hotel, so it's definitely an option to just walk to the light rail station and then take that anywhere else (Chase Field is 2 stops down from the closest one to the hotel -- $1.75 for a one-way ride, or $3.50 for an all-day pass). The convention center is even closer to the hotel than Chase Field, so getting there was an easier walk. Walking around in the winter would certainly be very pleasant, anyway. :) The hotel is kind of on the sketchy edge of town, but just barely on the border. It's not even sketchy, but just more run-down than the main downtown area. We never felt unsafe, even walking back to the hotel after 10pm sometimes. The staff was also quite friendly and nice -- the lobby where you check in (and get breakfast off the counter) is extremely tiny, but the guys checking you in were very nice. They even held onto a case of beer for us for the day we checked out while we went into town for the game, and we didn't want to leave the beer in the hot car all day long. They were nice about storing it in the back for us, and they didn't even drink any of it while watching it for us all day long. :-P It was an extra nicety that they did just because, not that they had to watch our stuff for us even after we checked out. All in all, it's a great value for your money, so if you can't afford the mid- to high-hundreds of dollars to stay somewhere fancy downtown, this is the place to be. You can still walk to everything, your room will be nice and new, and you can get free wifi and basic breakfast. A great deal!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected”
Reviews.Author: familytraveler555
Reviews.Content: OK, the guy at the desk was nice, and the bed was very comfortable. That being said, the carpet was filthy and turned our white socks black; the air conditioning did not reach to the bathroom, so it was extremely hot the entire stay; the door was flimsy and had a huge gap between it and the frame that allowed the hot air from outside to pour in; and the worst: when we pulled up to park outside our room, we saw the male housekeeper carrying clean towels to another room under his sweaty, bare armpit. I know Travelocity rated this motel only two stars, but I at least expected to be reasonably comfortable and for the room to be clean. I was very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Worth it”
Reviews.Author: mdauce27
Reviews.Content: The hotel had resources that the upscale hotels in the city did not provide. The hotel gave a fridge, microwave and internet that was included in your stay. The staff was very nice a and with having a microwave and fridge in my room it allowed me to save for tours around the city. If I went back to phoenix, this would be my one stop shop!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel for price, would come back!”
Reviews.Author: mlbbaseballtraveler
Reviews.Content: They say looks are deceiving, so true on this hotel. The outside is all pleasant looking but the inside is great. Completely remodeled and very clean. The rooms were great and the bed and pillows were very comfortable! Loved the decor and colors of the room. The rooms weren't too loud when the fan or A/C was on. But when turned off you could hear traffic. The front desk lady was very nice when we checked in but when we left to check out we walked all around the hotel trying to find someone to check out after waiting in the lobby for someone to check us out. Still never found anyone to check us out. The only bad thing about this hotel is that it could have had a better selection of breakfast food but I guess good enough for the price of the hotel. The price was extremely affordable especially being downtown and how nice the rooms are! We would come back again!!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: pagino
Reviews.Content: This was an amazing hotel. It exceeded all my expectations by all means. I was there for convention and decided to ABVI because of the location but when I walked in the room it was truly amazing. I could not get over the fact that the rooms were so well designed and to top it off it had a 37 inch flat panel in there. I really do not think all ABVI are like this one. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anybody.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: almo94
Reviews.Content: I have reviewed this site before I booked the room. To my honest opinion this motel is not as bad as being reported provided you have appropriate reson for it. Talking to front desk was very helpful. Yes area is not great but the price you pay is also very reasonable. For example I was alone(male) and on business with the conference held at convention center in downtown from 8 am to 5 pm. I was new for the city but still was able to walk from the motel to convention center in 10-15 minutes with good morning walk/exercise!! The room was excellent with good shower and bed and LCD TV!! For the sake of completely true i would make couple suggestions as follow: Keep the skin lotion/conditioner not only shampoo(again it is not big issue for me),provide free HBO or similar cable channel like that, would advice keep the lamp with plug(electric outlet on the base) also at bedside so one can charge cell phone while answer it also being next to the bed,somewhat noisy A/C,may be provide free ICE(no big deal for me to pay 25 cents but give plastic bag for hyginic need). Agree the location is not the best but for me being alone and looking close to Downtown was important. Also close to airport and HWY 10. Overall I am very satisfied. The previous traveller complaint of about toilet seat/carpet was luckily not issue for me on my stay. Free Internet is plus and it does work flawlessly! I am very impressed with the room!! If you momentarily forget about the location and the name while in the room you I am sure feel like you are in Holiday Inn!! Continental Breakfast was not imp. for me. You will get what you Pay for. You cannot compare with Comfort suites/Holiday Inn when you are paying less than $60/night. Please review your need and situation before blame to the management!! If I have to come again to Downtown Phoenix I will definitely look into this Motel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location - good value with friendly service”
Reviews.Author: BBoy_11
Reviews.Content: Very close to downtown area. room was very clean and comfortable, staff were friendly. Stayed for five nights. Would be happy to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, nicely furnished room, much better than expected.”
Reviews.Author: whimsyjan
Reviews.Content: After visiting Sedona and the Grand Canyon, we just needed an inexpensive room overnight in Phoenix before our trip to the airport the following afternoon. I saw the good reviews and great price for this hotel, and we weren't at all disappointed. The room was a good size and soundproofing was actually pretty good, despite there being a bunch of young Diamondback fans gathered there after the opening hiome game. Also, I needed to borrow a phone as I had left home without my charger; when I went into the lobby to ask, both the manager/owner? and a guest offered their cells. The staff was friendly and helpful, and I definitely would recommend this hotel. FYI, Cibo's Restaurant, recommended by the hotel staff, located a 2 block walk down the same street, turned out to have excellent food, with a festive, outdoor patio (heated for the cool evening weather).

Reviews.Title: “More accurately a "motel", have absolutely no expectation and it'll do in a pinch.”
Reviews.Author: niberg01
Reviews.Content: This hotel is what one might stay in for a night or afternoon in some dishonest situations. It says it is newly renovated. This means it has newer furniture, probably a new sink/counter and flat screen tv. The room smelled, the tub was chipped, worn and had no drain cover, and the shower head needed a good scrubbing. The bed was comfortable, but since there were cars parked right outside my door, and a thin one at that, a good night's sleep wasn't the first thing I'd add to the pro's list. I was told that the location at least wasn't a dangerous one. I had no frame of reference. Free breakfast was wrapped breakfast things that are purchased at your nearest gas station. The guy at the desk, though, was very friendly and helpful. I was to arrive super late to begin with, and there was a mix-up with my rental car. He gave me directions to be able to get there without needing a taxi. What was funny, though, is that in the morning, when I cut my stay there short, I went into the office to check out. I couldn't see him anywhere and there was no bell. I had to call him on my cell phone to get him up. So, what I liked best: service. Liked least: the whole place. But if you're in a pinch, it could be worse out there. I suppose it depends on your expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: isaton
Reviews.Content: The rooms are pretty clean and comfortable and the price worth it. The service is very friendly and helpful. It's not an expensive hotel considering that it's located in one of the best areas, in downtown Phoenix, you have a lot of places near and also the metro.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value is a Good Description”
Reviews.Author: daveeames
Reviews.Content: ABVI Downtown Phoenix is a clean and newly remodeled hotel. The location is excellent for the Convention Center without breaking the bank. The Hotel lies on the dividing line between the upscale downtown area and the not so desirable area. The rooms are newly renovated and clean, though a little small. The management and staff are really working to make the property all it can be. They have an excellent work desk and chair, refrigerator and microwave. They could use in room coffee. The lobby has coffee and danish in the morning. In summary, this is not the Hilton, but the location and price are great. I'll stay here again as paying for 2 rooms at the more upscale hotels down the street is the difference between a profitable trip and a trip to support an expensive hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for the money”
Reviews.Author: cooperkel
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised at this hotel. I didn't expect much for the price and location. When I got here I saw that it had been completely remodeled. The bed was incredibly comfortable and the room was large. Even the tile work in the shower stall was amazing. The hotel staff are all wonderful people. One issue is the noise. The shape of the hotel allows sound to echo from the parking lot. It isn't bad unless a loud family comes in the middle of the night. Overall, this is an excellent hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “Spend extra dollar & stay someplace SAFE/clean/quiet.”
Reviews.Author: Suzie32
Reviews.Content: Based on the online reviews we stayed at the Americas Best Value Inn downtown with myself & my son. Area is very noisy with high traffic. I had asked for a non-smoking room however my room had a funky odor minute we stepped in. I was very hesitant to walk barefoot, carpet was dirty. I suggest walk 2 blocks for better breakfast then standup breakfast served in office. My biggest concern while we stayed here was SAFETY. Some man..homeless my guess was knocking at our door in middle of night. Property is not inclosed where anyone from the street who do not have access can walk up to your door. This is simple scary.

Reviews.Title: “A Must stay when you are in Phoenix,AZ”
Reviews.Author: Carol19516
Reviews.Content: On January 14, 2011 We had the pleasant experience of staying at America's Best Value Inn in downtown Phoenix, AZ. The hotel had been newly renovated and the room was a nice surprise. Colorful, very clean and large. The owner, Sashi, even went as far as to drive us to a restaurant when we were not sure where we were going. We are planning another trip to Phoenix in March and have already booked our room for the 2 days that we will be there. Carol Massicotte Tucson, AZ

Reviews.Title: “clean, affordable, decent location”
Reviews.Author: busystudent
Reviews.Content: I was in Phoenix for a conference and wanted an inexpensive place to stay. The staff was friendly and helpful. Wi-fi is free so be sure to get the access code from the front desk. The free breakfast consists of coffee, juice, fresh fruit and a packaged pastry. The first night I had neighbors who spoke quite loudly which was solved with earplugs. The second night was much quieter. The room was quite spacious for one person.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value for the Travler”
Reviews.Author: cameoTax
Reviews.Content: This hotel has been going under renovation. The completed rooms are well organized, CLEAN, Full Size Dorm Refrigerator, Microwave, Hair dryer, Full vanity counter across the back of the room, Not fancy, very functional, Desk and matching adjustable chair. Very deep SOAKING TUB! Internet for the traveler, Location is Downtown by the Courts. Family operated. Occupants are travelers, and NO SMOKING in most of the rooms. Coffee, Juice and Pastry bar in the morning. I am a single woman and I am comfortable there.

Reviews.Title: “It is a pleasure to stay in Americas Best Value.”
Reviews.Author: bjwatts88
Reviews.Content: We have been staying once a month since last February. The hotel has been doing a upgrade. The rooms are clean, quite for down town. The staff are a pleasure to work with. We feel a great bargin for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly Acceptable, and a Great Price”
Reviews.Author: marcolius
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my no-frills trip. Pros: Great price, very helpful staff, clean room, good bed, very close to downtown, quiet even though they were doing some renovations. Cons: No luxuries, +/- neighborhood, laughably bad "breakfast".

Reviews.Title: “Very surprisingly nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: AtlantaDrummer
Reviews.Content: Although this motel was renovating at the time we stayed, our stay was good. The room was very clean and the bed was quite comfortable. There was free WiFi but the "continental breakfast" should simply be called free coffee and danish. The room itself was a bit sparse on accomodations such as a desk and decent size towels, but otherwise, it was well worth the price we paid ($49 including the tax). The location is fantastic - right near everything!

Reviews.Title: “Great all-around property”
Reviews.Author: penguinlover2010
Reviews.Content: I was in town for a week visiting some friends, I knew I wouldn't be in the hotel much, but I wanted one I was comfortable in. This place was great! Staff couldn't be more helpful with directions and fun places to go. Enjoyed breakfast before leaving in the mornings, and always very clean. Very centrally located to everyplace we wanted to go, was wonderful. When I come back to visit I'm definitely staying here!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and great location”
Reviews.Author: carolinagirl2010
Reviews.Content: Great hotel! My wife and I were visiting friends in the areas. We picked this hotel based on price, and were very please with the room and the staff. We needed directions and the staff was quick to print them for us. The location of this Inn is also great, many restaurants and things to do nearby. We only stayed 2 nigh, but would stay again if in the area. GREAT JOB!

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: flyers2010
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel and the many restaurants nearby. I was in town for a convention at the Phoenix convention center. It was great to be so close to be able to walk. This was my first stay at America's Best Value Inn, and I thought the breakfast was just perfect for what I was looking for. The rooms were very clean and up to date. The staff was very helpful and very nice to deal with. After my weeks stay I wanted to tell the management about my stay awesome stay.,and to my surprise the owner came out to see me. I was amazed to hear after talking with him, that he is getting ready to renovate the rooms. I told him to save his money, they were just great.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing motel at good affordable rate.”
Reviews.Author: buddhachild
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the motel for 3 nights on a business trip. The staff were very friendly and knew the area well. The room was very clean and comfortable, and was a great value for the money. It was very easy to get just about aywhere in the city. Close to Civic Center Plaza and downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Good Service”
Reviews.Author: tecae
Reviews.Content: This is a good hotel, good service, clean, nice staff and close to Phoenix downtown.

Reviews.Title: “We found this hotel to be Ok”
Reviews.Author: Macca17
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very central for what we were in Phoenix for (Sport). The rooms are an average size with basic amenaties. The hotel is basic all round, with no safe and an outdoor laundry. The continental bfast was also very basic. The staff were friendly and looked after our bags. Overall it is an ok hotel for what you pay with a great downtown location.

Reviews.Title: “Strategic location”
Reviews.Author: agaigl
Reviews.Content: Excellent location of the hotel Good service We suggest: To improve illumination of the room More variation in the breakfast (e.g. include cereals)

HotelInfo.Name: Americas Best Value Inn - Downtown Phoenix
HotelInfo.Address: 424 W Van Buren Street, Phoenix, AZ 85003
